text: Athaba (tadera karma) pramatta samudrera buke gabhira andhakarera n'yaya, yake udbelita kare tarangera upara taranga, yara upare ghana kalo megha ache. Ekera upara eka andhakara. Yakhana se tara hata bera kare, takhana take ekebare'i dekhate paya na. Allaha yake jyoti dena na, tara kona jyoti'i ne'i.
